text: it 's rom com about a guy who hates rom coms but has to make a rom com .
paging charlie kaufman !

but , obviously , what with being a rom com , the upcoming play it cool is not a whole bundle of meta , but just a chance to point out that the obvious things that are going to happen in the film are obvious .
still , with chris 'captain america ' evans in and michelle the only woman in true detective '' monaghan .
why do n't you watch the trailer and form your own opinion ?
what a poor guy

documents.title: new music the third !
text: first off , run the jewels have released a new track from their upcoming rtj2 .

it 's the usual combo of wiseguy street talk and low key percussion , but it 's made distinct by a/ killer mike 's verse and b/ the weird alien voice noises provided by michael winslow , aka motor mouth jones of police academy .

here 's run the jewels and here 's winslow doing every part in led zep 's a whole lotta love impressive meanwhile , on german radio , royal blood are giving the grunge treatment to lana del ray 's west coast

documents.title: watch kanye west do a ty kanye west thing
text: here in short is what happened : kanye west holds up a concert in sydney until two punters follow his instructions to stand up .
the punters are disabled , one in a wheelchair .
kanye does not know this and so insists on the point , subjecting the pair to a massive booing from his crowd .
finally he is made aware of what is happening .
he double checks to make sure they 're in a wheelchair .
then , and without so much as a sorry , he leaps back into a version of good life .
wadda guy

documents.title: the batmobile has not been stolen
text: there was a rumour that someone had stolen the new batmobile from the set of batman vs superman .
it was n't true ( but since the theft had allegedly taken place in detroit , some people believed it ) .
zacksnyder ( @ zacksnyder ) case closed .
director zack snyder has tweeted a to confirm as much , while also having a dig at rival upcoming blockbuster star wars : episode vii .
either that something went very wrong at a fancy dress party this is not the crossover marketing you are looking for

documents.title: new music ( and gif ) : king tuff - headbanger
text: glorious little piece of scuzz glam rock from sub pop 's king tuff bang your little head and here 's an in no way migraine inducing gif to go with it .
ahhhh , my eyyyyeeessss pop

documents.title: dracula : family comes first
text: how to reimagine the legend of dracula for the modern world ?
hollywood has had an idea .
make him a guy who becomes an undead blood sucking titan of horror cos he , you know , loves his family .

that - along with the fact that the lorde cover of everybody wants to rule the world , should be buried somewhere in the waters around fukushima - is the main message to take away from the trailer for dracula untold .
it stars wales 's luke evans as the count , charles dance as the menacing voiceover , and is in cinemas in october fang you , fang you very much

documents.title: levi roots is richer than god
text: the dirty hateful fear-mongering esteemed journalists at the sun on sunday have compiled a list of the richest reality stars in the world .
here 's a link to their full list , which you 'll need to buy a subscription to view , and we suggest you do n't .
below , however , are the top 15 names .
i 'd say it 's not exhaustive because i ca n't believe that there 's not an american winner of the bachelor , say , who 's earned more money than craig 'happy hammers ' philips .
it 's also unclear as to the time period we 're talking about but just look at levi roots , just look at him .
£ 30m and all for inventing an alliterative condiment ( and crisps , and pizzas and cashew nuts ) .
here he is encouraging a flashmob three years ago : dance wicked !
the reality rich list 1 .
kim kardashian west , £ 39m 2 .
paris hilton , £ 36m 3 .
levi roots , £ 30m 4 .
susan boyle , £ 22m 6 .
cheryl fernandez versini , £ 16m 6 .
kelly clarkson , £ 16m 7 .
jennifer hudson , £ 15m 8 .
one direction , £ 14m 9 .
leona lewis , £ 13m 10 .
myleene klass , £ 11m 11 .
will young , £ 10m 12 .
nicole richie , £ 9m 13 .
nicola roberts and kimberley walsh , £ 7m 15 .
craig phillips , £ 6.9m
a fair point has been made by bashmore in the comments regarding this week 's 'charts ' a comment , today wan na know more ? ! ? ! ? ? !
of course you do , here 's the guardian review of ryad 's album described as being a knowing album , an album that declares , i will rock you . ''
and here , also , is a stream of the entire album.. you can also buy the album , cos it 's out .
and that brings to an end a broadcast on behalf of the ryan adams party

documents.title: blue steel in the hour of chaos
text: zoolander 2 is on the way .
or at least , there 's a script for it , and will ferrell is going to get to read it .
according to 'joblo.com ' this is what ferrell said .

joblo.com .com mugatu , of course , is the creator of the fashion line derelicte and , also , the piano key necktie the screaming at the end is the best bit he also gets farty and bloaty with a frothy latte that jumper is actually fashionable in real life now i look forward to a zoolander 2 .
the only thing i can see stopping it is that there 's nothing to take the piss out of in fashion any more .
hot images
new music : daphni aka caribou remixes caribou aka daphni the new caribou album is coming soon and it 's a bit of a stormer .
it 's dance music with a human touch .
not that humans do n't usually touch dance music , just that it 's often made to sound as otherworldly and machine-inspired as possible .
caribou makes techno that you imagine being played by a band , even though it is n't .
anyway , our love is the title track off the new album and , already , it 's been remixed by daphni aka dan snaith aka , er , caribou himself .
imo the remix is no great shakes , but the original certainly is .
which is why i post it again below more sick graphics you can read an interview with dan snaith aka caribou aka daphni in the guide soon
sam smith continues his reign of tear-jerking terror sam smith , looking down on everyone and here 's the album top five .

notable is the popping up of robert plant , runner up in the pretend wizard championships at number 2 , with his globe-trotting bluesy-rock collection that 's probably more innovative than the rest of the five put together .
that 's not to say better , mind , just innovativerer .

the rest is comprised of the afore-mentioned smith , cabbage patch kid busker ed sheeran ; royal blood who probs wish they were mates with rob plant and george ezra who is just a mystery to me , a mystery .
calvin harris tops the charts , as nostradamus once prophesied this week 's top 40 !
( abridged to fit ) look at that list of best selling singles for the week ending september 13 and be glad that you are alive .

harris is top with another dose of hi-res edm , lily wood and the prick are a terribly-named french group who 've been given something of a balearic makeover , sam smith is the 21st century englebert humperdinck , sorry , sam cooke , taylor swift keeps rabbits ( in prison ) and iggy azalea could be treatable with a new vaccine .

bulletin.text: It's Monday which means today's blog is ALL facts. It's ONLY the informational stream you need to take the week seriously.
If we end up making stuff up just to pad things out, we'll let you know.
Get involved if you will, in the comments below or @twitterid.
